sentence.Network_en: I have rarely read anything so insultingly sexist as this article.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很少读到像这篇文章般带有侮辱性的性别歧视的东西。
安东尼无礼地放声大笑。

sentence.Network_en: He behaves insultingly toward his parents.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对自己的父母很没有礼貌.

list.abs: he behaves insultingly toward his parents ., 他对自己的父母很没有礼貌.

entry.def: Something that is insulting is rude or offensive.

example.ex: The article was insulting to the families of British citizens...
example.tran: 那篇文章侮辱了英国公民家庭。

example.ex: One of the apprentices made an insulting remark to a passing officer.
example.tran: 其中一名学徒对着一名路过的警官说了一句侮辱他的话。

means.word_mean: 1. in a disrespectful and insulting manner;
2. in an unfair and insulting manner;

sentences.sentence: "this internationally known writer was foully condemned by the Muslim fundamentalists"
